name: Odins Hall
description:
Deep dive into the age of ancient norse mythology. To the last hours before Ragnarök, to be precise. Help Odin to make the last preparations for the dawn of the gods.

A little fun point and click adventure. A bit more on the artsy, athmospheric side of things.

Feel free to comment or give me feedback, especially on bugs you discover.

I hope you have fun playing Odins Hall.
